title: Common Phrases: Storytelling (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Storytelling subcategory within Common Phrases. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: He said that he had seen a mermaid in the sea.
cards.romaji: Kare wa, umi de ningyo o mita to itta.
cards.japanese: 彼は、海で人魚を見たと言った。
